formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DBput' =-
[Synopsis] Store a value in the database
[Description] DBput(family/key=value): This application will store the given value in the specified location in the Asterisk database. This application has been deprecated in favor of the DB function.
